article: I once had a teacher whose husband died of heart attack. About a week after his death, she shared some of her _ understanding with students. _ the late afternoon sunlight came shinning in and the class was nearly _ , she moved a few things aside on the edge of her _ and sat down there.With a gentle look of reflection on her face, she paused and said, Class is over. I would like to _ with all of you, a thought that is _ to class, but which I feel is very _ . Each of us is put here on earth to learn, share, love and give of ourselves. _ of us knows when this fantastic experience will end. It can be _ at any moment. Perhaps this is the Power s way of telling us that we must make the _ of every single day. Her eyes were _ to water, but she went on, So I would like you all to make me a _ .From now on, on your way to school, or on your way home, find something beautiful to _ . It could be the _ of the breeze slightly rustling the leaves in the trees, or the way the morning light catches one autumn leaf as it _ gently to the ground. Please look for these things, and _ them. It is the _ things that we are put here on earth to enjoy. We must make it important to notice them, for at _ it can all be taken away. The class was completely _ . We all picked up our books and walked out of the room silently. That _ , I noticed more things on my way home from school than I had that whole semester.Remember, life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
